description: Number of polygons of length 4n on Manhattan lattice.
references: I. G. Enting and A. J. Guttmann, Self-avoiding polygons on the square, L and Manhattan lattices, J. Phys. A 18 (1985), 1007-1017.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: D. Bennett-wood, J. L. Cardy, I. Enting, A. J. Guttmann and A. L. Owczarek, On the Non-Universality of a Critical Exponent for Self-Avoiding~Walks, Nuc. Phys. B, 528, 533--552, 1998. [From Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Sep 13 2010]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Sep 13 2010
